author: Staff Reporter
text:
The staff of the Forest Department of Kancheepuram district seized 24 logs of Red Sanders near Uthiramerur on Tuesday.

Sources said that following a tip-off, Forest Department officials visited Magaral village, where the logs were concealed in plastic sheets and dumped inside a pond.

Investigations are on to trace the suspects.

Listed as an endangered species, Red Sanders is highly valued and its trade is highly restricted, Forest Department staff added.
title: Red Sanders seized
